summary.span: 命名空间及其所有公开成员均属于组件对象模型 (COM) 辅助功能接口的托管包装器。

span.span: The namespace and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) accessibility interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 的详细信息，请参阅[Microsoft Active Accessibility](/windows/win32/winauto/microsoft-active-accessibility)文档。For more information about , see the [Microsoft Active Accessibility](/windows/win32/winauto/microsoft-active-accessibility) documentation.
